title: prism_intelligence Action Inventory
verdict: 250 actions verified (documented as 238 -- delta of 12 from post-count additions)
delta_explanation: 12 actions added after QA-MS0 inventory: 4 L3_INDUSTRY (tool_crib_status, digital_twin_state, predictive_maintenance_alert, energy_report) + 8 from late ACNC/Shop additions
routing_pattern: Cascading ternary: action-group arrays checked with .includes(), fallthrough to IntelligenceEngine
key_value_extraction: intelligenceExtractKeyValues() covers all 250 actions with per-action field mapping

findings.title: Action count mismatch: 250 actual vs 238 documented
findings.issue: ACTIONS array contains 250 entries but documentation and constants reference 238. The delta of 12 comes from L3 Industry actions (4) and late Product Engine additions.
findings.impact: Low - cosmetic documentation gap. All 250 actions have proper routing and key-value extraction.
findings.fix: Update constants.ts and documentation to reflect 250 actions
